728547f-a.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Slosson Terrace
728547f-a.text:
Bay Street, north from Slosson Terrace. In the
background is the Richmond Borough Hall, at Hyatt
Street; on the right is the Staten IIsland Chamber
of Commerce Building.
View 1: October 22, 1931
View 2: October, 1936
P. L. Sperr
728547f-a.folder: Bay Street & Slosson Terrace, Staten Island, NY

728546f-b.title: Richmond: Bay Street - Slosson Terrace
728546f-b.text:
Bay Street, north from Slosson Terrace. In the
center background is the Richmond Borough Hall, at
Ayatt Street; on the right is the Staten Island Chamber
of Commerce Building.
View 1: June 26, 1928
View 2: January 13, 1931
P. L. Sperr
728546f-b.folder: Bay Street & Slosson Terrace, Staten Island, NY
